trans-unit.source: state is a very important variable in this program. After executing a statement, the result is always stored in state first.
trans-unit.target: state 是此程序中非常重要的变量。执行语句后，结果始终先存储在状态中。

trans-unit.source: A interpreter for celeref programming language
trans-unit.target: celeref编程语言的解释器。

trans-unit.source: A versatile interpreter in python to execute programs written in JSON.
trans-unit.target: python中的一个通用解释器,用于执行用JSON编写的程序。

trans-unit.source: Activate it;
trans-unit.target: 激活它。

trans-unit.source: Add the schema path located in src/schema folder. See examples in examples folder for help.
trans-unit.target: 添加位于 src/schema 文件夹中的架构路径。请参阅示例文件夹中的 examples 以获取帮助。

trans-unit.source: After program has finished running the final value of state will be the result.
trans-unit.target: 程序完成运行后，将得出 state 的最终值。

trans-unit.source: Building from source
trans-unit.target: 从源头开始建设

trans-unit.source: Clone the repository first
trans-unit.target: 先克隆版本库

trans-unit.target: 在Visual Studio代码中创建一个JSON文件

trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的虚拟环境

trans-unit.source: Documentation
trans-unit.target: 文件资料

trans-unit.source: E.g. To run the hello-world.json example:
trans-unit.target: 例如，要运行 hello-world.json 示例：

trans-unit.source: First you need to install python 3. Now you can install the package via pip:
trans-unit.target: 首先你需要安装python 3。现在你可以通过pip安装这个包。

trans-unit.source: Here is a sample program written in celeref-lang:
trans-unit.target: 这里是一个用celeref-lang编写的示例程序。

trans-unit.source: If it says celeref is not found, follow this help:
trans-unit.target: 如果 celeref 未找到celeref，请遵循以下帮助：

trans-unit.source: In Linux: venv/bin/activate
trans-unit.target: 在Linux中： venv/bin/activate

trans-unit.source: In MacOS: venv/bin/activate
trans-unit.target: 在MacOS中： venv/bin/activate

trans-unit.source: In Windows: venv\Scripts\activate
trans-unit.target: 在Windows中： venv\Scripts\activate

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Linux
trans-unit.target: Linux

trans-unit.source: MacOS
trans-unit.target: MacOS

trans-unit.source: Now install dependencies:
trans-unit.target: 现在安装依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: Now to run the script:
trans-unit.target: 现在来运行这个脚本。

trans-unit.source: Save the program to hello-world.json file, and run it using:
trans-unit.target: 将程序保存到 hello-world.json 文件，并使用以下命令运行它：

trans-unit.source: Test if it is installed successfully:
trans-unit.target: 测试是否安装成功。

trans-unit.source: This project in under development. APIs are subjected to change in future. Documentation is further away. Follow schema descriptions for basic documentation for now.
trans-unit.target: 本项目正在开发中。API在未来会发生变化。文件是更远。暂时按照模式说明来编写基本文档。

trans-unit.source: To display a list of all available functions:
trans-unit.target: 显示所有可用功能的列表。

trans-unit.source: To note a few basic things:
trans-unit.target: 要注意一些基本的东西。

trans-unit.source: To pass and array or objects as arguments to call method, you can use { "state": <your array or object> }.
trans-unit.target: 要传递和数组或对象作为 call 方法的参数，可以使用 { "state": <your array or object> } 。

trans-unit.source: To search for specific functions, pass a query after -s:
trans-unit.target: 要搜索特定功能，请在 -s 之后传递查询：

trans-unit.source: Windows
trans-unit.target: 窗口

trans-unit.source: With schema defined, editor will catch schema errors and auto-suggest available expressions.
trans-unit.target: 在定义了模式后,编辑器将捕获模式错误并自动建议可用的表达式。

trans-unit.source: Writing your first program
trans-unit.target: 编写您的第一个程序

trans-unit.source: You need Python 3 to execute this script.
trans-unit.target: 你需要Python 3来执行这个脚本。

trans-unit.source: You need a code-editor that supports intellisense for JSON schema. My preference is Visual Studio Code.
trans-unit.target: 你需要一个支持 intellisense 的 JSON 模式的代码编辑器。我的首选是Visual Studio Code。
